name: Vocational and technical training projects revolving fund
text: There is established a revolving fund for the vocational and technical training projects of the community colleges and the University of Hawaii at Hilo into which shall be deposited the receipts from fees for services, supplies, and use of equipment provided by or in connection with these projects.  Funds deposited in this account shall be expended for vocational and technical training projects, and supplies, equipment, and services related thereto. 	The University of Hawaii at Hilo shall report as of the close of each fiscal year to the governor and the legislature on the revolving fund's revenues and expenditures for the reported year.  These reports shall be submitted not later than twenty days prior to the convening of each regular session. [L 1974, c 189, §4; am L 1985, c 151, §1; am L 1988, c 75, §1]
